imdb_user_reviews.contents: Tony Scott's high-octane action keeps the film relentlessly intense and gripping from start to finish
Unstoppable - thank you Hollywood for putting out an action movie that works
All aboard for a thrill ride !!
Trains, Denzel and Tony Scott, again?  Yeah, but this one's so much better than that dreadful Pelham remake.
It works on the principles of late afternoon escapism and it's an efficient nail-biter.
Ridiculous - Who's in Charge Around Here!!!
A simple, solid, and very intense thrill ride from start to finish.
Potential for a Great Movie reduced to Crayon Cartoon
Tony Scott, needs to take lesions on how to make good movies
This is NOT how you make a suspense movie!
Did they have any railroad technical advisers????
Top of the line feel-good action thriller that stays on the rails and doesn't go off track
A waste of 2 hours of my life
Suspenseful and believable runaway train flick, but lacks the depth of "Runaway Train"
if you understand trains you will hate this more than I did
During the making of this film...
You're Waiting for a Train (That's Going to Kill You, If You're Not Careful)
Fast pace and suspenseful, but, one must suspend logical thought processes.
a movie with trains and spinning cameras
Unstoppable is a great, full throttle action movie!    :-)
I found myself shouting at the TV "This film is so rubbish"
This movie is so bad, that you just have to watch it...
Watching trains has never been so exciting!
Denzel Washington delivers yet again in "Unstoppable".
'Camera circles the scene on rail' the movie
Can Denzel Washington and Chris Pine stop a runaway train?
A (mostly) realistic edge of your seat thriller that is The Fast and the Furious (2001) for train junkies
Unstoppable...that's why I never pressed pause.
Feels more like an ambitious TV movie than a big-budget blockbuster.
Fun, edge of your seat adrenaline ride -the train actually takes on a life of its own
not much of a plot, but still it has the Denzel trademark
A Quick but Very Intense Film,
Just about perfect as far as escapism goes.
A tight, gripping, and rousing thriller
Its a pretty good popcorn flick fun!
Well put together film, yet not the thriller I was after.
Far too many "You can do it" cutaways
This ain't training. In training they just give you an F. Out here you get killed.
Freight train, freight train, going so fast...
SPEED meets RUNAWAY TRAIN - Denzel/Scott combo provide the thrills in spades! HANG ON!
It was OK....but not great or original in any way
The main problem with this is that if you've seen Tony Scott's movies before you definitely seen this one already
An Old-Fashioned Thriller About A Runaway Train
Unstoppable is a "speed" driven adrenaline ride packed with suspense and gripping tension from beginning to end.
as long as you aren't looking for things like story and character, it's fun, I guess
It's a bird, it's a plane, no... it's Denzel Washington and director Tony Scott working together on their fifth film!
1 million tons of steel. 100,000 people at risk. 100 minutes to impact.
This film was flawed but enjoyable
A rather straightforward movie about a run-away train
How "dramatizing" a real event turns it into a nonsense.
Predictable, but fast-paced, fun, high-speed entertainment
If you want a Speed like movie
It's good, but don't take it so seriously.
Intense, Epic, Disastrous, Destructive, Explosive, Etc.!!!
"Good thing is that it sticks to the subject from the starting."
Able to make you forget about everything else for 90 minutes.
Directors should use their common sens
A well made action thriller from Tony Scott
Not the runaway it could have been but still competent - just.
A runaway train must be stopped...but is it unstoppable?
Denzel doesn't want to be a man on fire again
Just action. Effective action, but just action nonetheless
A movie that knows what it is and sticks to that
Through his structural and aesthetic techniques, Scott shows very little faith in his audience.
Predictable but not bad... actually I enjoyed watching it.
Genuine high-powered escapism compressed into 90 odd minutes
Daytime TV disaster movie with a bigger budget
Scott and Washington collaborate and deliver another success of it's sort
This surprised me, because I didn't think a train story could be good.
Gripping, intense, edge of your seat stuff
whitout doubt the worst movie I saw with Denzel
Unbelievably fun and entertaining! Best action movie since the A-Team. Watch this with popcorn, I loved this movie. I say A
A True Story of a Runaway Train parody movie
Thrilling and Exciting Film inspired by True Events
Stupid but entertaining, frenetically made fun
A thrilling train ride that you must catch as the year comes to a close
Good but nothing compare to Speed.
It just keeps going and going and going . . .
Tony and Denzel get back on track.
Almost dull and generic as the trailer
Been there, seen that, far too many times..
Big, Dumb Action Movie, and nothing else
Washington dragged to unchartered depths - Tragic!!!!
A new and exciting Train movie; But I saw a better one earlier.
Unstoppable force meets two immovable objects.
what a good film this is.
The Train Goes Faster. The Tension Goes Greater
Fiction front; Could've been better; Real-life; Commendable
Scott and Washington do it again
"Unstoppable" is a solid crowd-pleaser and one of the better action/thrillers of 2010.
thrilling and dramatic with a great cast!
Lots of Sound, Flash, Momentum and Manipulation, Only a Rudimentary Level of Thrill
A little overdone, but it still works
Heroes are where you don't expect them to be
Dependable pros Tony Scott and Denzel Washington optimize solid, straightforward concept
More like a runaway hit than a train wreck.
A trailer being stretched to a full length movie
Total and utter cheesy American sh*t
Denzel Washington - You delivered the goods!!
I was setting on the edge of my seat thru the whole thing!
Hollywood comes up with a WINNER!
Denzel and Scott on a train once again
chris pine no doubt blowed my mind denzal kept me biting my nails
one of the best action films of the year!
If it's your type of film, you'll enjoy it
A Head on Collision with "Action Drama"
It's a movie that your mother will watch, and she wont shut up about for the next week or so.
Washington and Pine's back story was a little lame. Overall though, I'm pleased to report I did very much enjoy this movie.
Pine & Washington save this runaway wreck...
A rail yard worker screws up and sends a toxic-tank loaded train on its way without an engineer.
Chris Pine has a future ahead
The film *is* a bomb! Uh, I mean, the train is

Old School masterpiece in the age of 3d and CGI

Some have a need to STOP the Speed in this thrill-ride
Highly engaging, enjoyable film from beginning to end
Slow down.  Look out.  Here it comes.

Okay if you don't know anything about trains
Totally awesome and must watch movie
More thrills in 2012's end of the world concept than Unstoppable's runaway train
Tony Scott and Denzel Washington are back with yet another 'thriller' as an unmanned train is running along the tracks. Not exactly Trainspotting...
